description:
Giroro helps two young aliens help themselves when they come to Earth seeking vengeance for their father. Then, Dasonu☆Maso`s younger sister, Dasonu☆Marie, studies comedy by observing the masters, the Keroro platoon!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Giroro - My Way of Getting Revenge! / Keroro - Dasonu Maso Again and Again and Again?
ギロロ あだ討ちするはわれにあり! であります / ケロロ またまたまたダソヌ☆マソ? であります
